#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,t=0;
	cin>>n;
	while(n!=0)
	{
		
		int a[n],tot=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			tot+=a[i];
		}
	//	cout<<tot<<endl;
		tot=tot/n;
		sort(a,a+n);
		int i=0,sum=0;
		while(a[i]<tot)
		{
			sum+=a[i];
			i++;
		}
	//	cout<<tot<<" "<<i<<" \n";
	t++;
		cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl;
		if(i>0)
		cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<(tot*(i))-sum<<".\n\n";
		else
		cout<<"The minimum number of moves is 0.\n\n";
	
		cin>>n;
	}
	return 0;
}
